attributes.action: Change Your Vote If Badger Cull Persists
attributes.additional_details:
It is with heavy heart that I have decided to change my vote, should the badger cull ensue.

This cull has been SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN not to work.  Naturalists and scientists alike have come out to give their opinion that THIS CULL WILL NOT WORK.

I call upon the Government to pay attention to the e-peition submitted by Dr Brian May, which at last viewing had over 191,000 signatures.  Should this not happen, I call upon everyone who has signed this petition to also sign this one being created now - to say that SHOULD THIS CULL HAPPEN, THE GOVERNMENT WILL LOSE VOTES.

Maybe - just maybe - they'll listen to that!
